name: edb recovery
short_description:
Two types of recovery methods are provided by the MS Exchange server:

1) Soft Recovery: - This method is used to bring the database into consistent state.

2) Hard Recovery: - This repair process is applied when soft recovery process does not work. 

i) ESEUTIL/p Utility: - It is a command line repair utility that repairs the header of the damaged database file. It removes the corrupted data from the database, users sometimes experience their precious data loss issues. So, it is highly recommended to make a backup of database before running this repair tool.

ii) eseutil /p repair process - This utility verifies that the database is now error free and ready to mount.
